item.title: Rina add a quote by Winston Groom
item.description: "Life is like a box of chocolates." -- Winston Groom

item.title: Rina add a quote by Alfred Lord Tennyson
item.description: "If I had a flower for every time I thought of you...I could walk through my garden forever." -- Alfred Lord Tennyson

item.title: Rina add a quote by Walt Disney Company
item.description: "The flower that blooms in adversity is the rarest and most beautiful of all." -- Walt Disney Company

item.title: Rina add a quote by Libba Bray
item.description: "But aren't many gardens beautiful because they are imperfect?...aren't the strange, new flowers that arise by mistake or misadventure as pleasing as the well-tended and planned?" -- Libba Bray

item.title: Rina add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "With freedom, books, flowers, and the moon, who could not be happy?" -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Rina add a quote by Georgia O'Keefe
item.description: "If you take a flower in your hand and really look at it, it's your world for a moment." -- Georgia O'Keefe

item.title: Rina add a quote by Hans Christian Anderson
item.description: "Just living is not enough," said the butterfly, "one must have sunshine, freedom, and a little flower." -- Hans Christian Anderson

item.title: Rina add a quote by Alice Walker
item.description: "The nature of this flower is to bloom." -- Alice Walker

item.title: Rina add a quote by Henri Matisse
item.description: "There are always flowers for those who want to see them." -- Henri Matisse

item.title: Rina add a quote by Anita Diamant
item.description: "If you want to understand any woman you must first ask about her mother and then listen carefully. Stories about food show a strong connection. Wistful silences demonstrate unfinished business. The more a daughter knows about the details of her mother's life - without flinching or whining - the stronger the daughter." -- Anita Diamant

item.title: Rina add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If you want your children to be intelligent, read them fairy tales. If you want them to be more intelligent, read them more fairy tales." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rina add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "Make it a rule never to give a child a book you would not read yourself." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Rina add a quote by Anna Quindlen
item.description: "I would be most content if my children grew up to be the kind of people who think decorating consists mostly of building enough bookshelves." -- Anna Quindlen

item.title: Rina add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "Children aren't coloring books. You don't get to fill them with your favorite colors." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Rina add a quote by Walt Disney
item.description: "Our greatest national resource is the minds of our children." -- Walt Disney

item.title: Rina add a quote by Aristotle
item.description: "Those who educate children well are more to be honored than they who produce them; for these only gave them life, those the art of living well." -- Aristotle

item.title: Rina add a quote by Barbara Johnson
item.description: "To be in your children's memories tomorrow, You have to be in their lives today." -- Barbara Johnson

item.title: Rina add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "If we are worried about the future, then we must look today at the upbringing of children." -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Rina add a quote by Jonathan Swift
item.description: "Books, the children of the brain." -- Jonathan Swift

item.title: Rina add a quote by Franklin D. Roosevelt
item.description: "We cannot always build the future for our youth, but we can build our youth for the future." -- Franklin D. Roosevelt

item.title: Rina add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "If we are to reach real peace in the world, we shall have to begin with the children." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Rina add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "Grown-ups never understand anything by themselves, and it is tiresome for children to be always and forever explaining things to them" -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Rina add a quote by Fyodor Dostoevsky
item.description: "The soul is healed by being with children." -- Fyodor Dostoevsky

item.title: Rina add a quote by Tammy Huang
item.description: "I don't give free hugs; I give meaningful hugs." -- Tammy Huang

item.title: Rina add a quote by Charles Caleb Colton
item.description: "A hug is worth a thousand words. A friend is worth more." True friendship is like sound health; the value of it is seldom known until it be lost." -- Charles Caleb Colton

item.title: Rina add a quote by zita h vasavan-ind-germany
item.description: "HUG a letter stand for Helping Unlock Greatness" -- zita h vasavan-ind-germany

item.title: Rina add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Men marry because they are tired; women, because they are curious: both are disappointed." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Rina add a quote by J.K. Rowling
Rina add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Family isn’t something that’s supposed to be static, or set. People marry in, divorce out. They’re born, they die. It’s always evolving, turning into something else." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Rina add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer
